content:
I'd like to officially welcome you all
To the Neo Astralink Wave,
And to this Bubble World...
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content:
Hoho, sorry about that,
didn't realize my voice was so loud...
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: How mysterious~! Will our future journeys be this turbulent too?
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: That said, there can be some Maelstroms around, and getting swept up and lost is common occurrence, hoho~
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: <size=64>Home Sweet Home~!</size>
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: I hope this tea helps ease your travel fatigue. And I'm truly sorry you all had to go through that little maelstrom.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content:
Have no fear, for I am here!
You're completely safe.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: We can "weave" this Bubble World however we like. Once Astralink is established, we can even explore the vast <color=#8AAB4B>Sky River</color> at will, and connect to all kinds of Bubble Worlds.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: But for us, this is a new beginning. I'm no natural, and this is my first time being a coordinator, but no matter the circumstances, I'll use all that I know to...
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Weaving the Bubble World to my heart's content!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Ho~ It's an honor to share the same wish as you. I'm looking forward to the Bubble World you'll weave, and I hope I can help you bring it to life.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: And I'm going to purchase more goods. I want everyone to be surrounded by their favorite things all the time!~
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: We are new to this Bubble World and have limited Astralink connection. Without proper logistics, it's a bit challenging to start building houses... That's why I prepared quick and easy tents for everyone.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Well, what about you, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>? What do you envision for yourself in your new life?
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: And, and! I want to start a shop that gets all the goodies from Bubble Worlds into the hands of people who need them without delay!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Traveling and exploring all places!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Looks like our place is going to be bustling and filled with good tea and great times with friends, all the time.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: <size=30>Thank you very much!</size> <size=30>From zero to hero!</size>
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho~ Everyone's got interesting wishes despite our Bubble World being... a blank slate, at the moment.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Assist everyone with weaving the Bubble World, establish the Astralink, and make sure everyone lives carefree.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Weaving the Bubble World sounds fun~ But how do you do it?
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: As you all know, this place is a Bubble World that has just matured and is waiting for us to "weave" it.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: In the future, I hope to witness more of the unknown and the curious in the mysterious Sky River.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hohoho... All we need to do is <color=#8AAB4B>make this place our home</color>, establish a well-connected <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Station</color> for travel, and put up the signpost to guide the way.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: But to achieve that, we'll need some prep work. No rush though, we will take it slow... Life isn't a speedrun.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Making more friends!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: After you've had your tea, find <color=#8AAB4B>Glenn</color> to claim your <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color> and pick a good spot to start your comfortable living, hoho...
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: <size=30>Are you sure you don't mean completely frantic?</size>!!!{短暂停}... Yes, of course... completely safe.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho! Everything is unknown. I hope everyone can live freely, create freely, and realize their ideal life here.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Don't worry, there's no danger here. The Bubble World we picked is great for living. Zinnia and trees grow beautifully here and are delicious to drink, ho~!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: "Where the heart leads, nothing is out of reach." This is also the purpose of the Neo Astralink Wave. So thank you all for starting this journey from scratch with us.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho, the most important first step right now is... to settle down!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Truth be told, I've been studying in the Academia since I was little. My life experience is pretty much "zero," so I was quite hesitant when I moved here. But now, I am very content~!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Collecting all kinds of goodies!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Swoosh~! I'm gonna take everyone to all kinds of eccentric Bubble Worlds. It's gonna be fun!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: So for the beginning, please entrust me to start everyone off smoothly to a new life.
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: But this isn't a dangerous place, so why the hesitation? Could it be that... {短暂停}our new life will be super exciting?!
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本

content: Me? I want to drive freely and adventure in all the cool, unexplored places! <size=30>Gonna come back to the Guild with a swoosh!</size>
info: 围炉煮茶cs后-莫白_主流程文本
